project_descr: The project aims to contribute to national efforts to achieve HR of all Angolans and to expand access to justice services, the achievement of gender equality and the empowerment of women and girls.

outputs.output_descr: Strengthen human rights in Angola through alignment of national legal framework with international law and strengthen the capacity of national human rights institutions and  processes.

This output aims to support the Ombudsman institution to effectively exert its functions as a guarantor of administrative legality and as a National Human Rights Institution (NHRI), by strengthening the capacity of its technical personnel, its internal processes of case handling and communication with citizens, its cooperation with other state institutions and its accreditation with the Global Alliance of National Human Rights Institutions (NHRIs).

project_title: realization of a just and inclusive society
